name: Spinach Chicken Parmesan
author: KMSMOKEY
summary: A family favorite. A classic dish with a Popeye-esque twist; so eat yer spinach (with chicken parmesan) and enjoy it, too!
ingredients: ½ (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a small bowl combine cheese and seasoning
Roll chicken pieces in cheese mixture to coat lightly
Arrange coated chicken pieces in an 8x8x2 inch baking dish
In a small saucepan, saute green onion in butter/margarine until tender
Stir in flour, then add milk all at once
Stir in drained spinach and pimiento and mix together
Spoon spinach mixture over chicken and sprinkle with remaining cheese mixture
Bake uncovered for 30 to 35 minutes or until tender and chicken juices run clear
